column6:
We are centrally located on South Padre Island and are a couple minute walk from the beach or to the bay, if you prefer.
Our place is the lower-right unit of a fourplex built in 2010.
While at our place, we can guarantee you will feel like home.

Please note: prices quoted do not include 17% occupancy tax. The Guest will be responsible for paying the tax at or prior to check-in.
